website_summaries.verdict: Durable and roomy, this water-resistant organizer includes a removable insulated storage bag for quick grocery runs.
pros: Large, multi-section organizer with insulated bag
Eyelets and handles for easy transport
Comes with V-straps to help keep organizer stable and prevent sliding
cons: use with cooler packs rather than ice

customer_reviews.title: Have just recently purchased so time will determine factors.
customer_reviews.text: So far I am liking my cargo organizer. I have a Honda CR-V and it fits nicely in the cargo area. I like the removable cooler for grocery shopping. The organizer stays in place without strapping it down and though I haven't used it long, it appears efficient and will last me a long time. After using it awhile it is roomy enough for groceries for one person, but one thing I do not care for is how poorly the zippered cooler works. I like that I can lift it out and take it by the handle inside the house, but the zipper sticks and would prefer a lift-off cover for the cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D.

customer_reviews.title: The cooler is not removable
customer_reviews.text: I specifically purchased this product for a Ford Fusion Energi, that has a very small trunk space due to the battery. I wanted to be able to take the cooler into the store and put food into it that had to kept cold. The picture and the narrative both lead one to believe that it is removable. IT IS NOT. I could have purchased many other trunk organizers for less money had I know this was the case, It is false and misleading advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Dean C. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the medium one. I like both of these products but I think I like the medium version better. Suits my needs better plus the larger version walls are a little more flimsy than the medium size but the large does have the extra space so there’s that. But overall Tuff has a very good product that is well made. I have both of these in my SUV and are keeping me organized.
customer_reviews.author: gil fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Needed a good trunk storage solution
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a new car after driving the same car for 16 years. One thing I loved about my old car was a cargo net that attached inside the trunk opening. This helped to keep all my groceries and other bags corralled. So began the search of something functional as a replacement. This Tuff Viking 3-in-1 Convertible Large Trunk Organizer fits the bill. It holds as much as I need it to and while it takes up a good portion of the trunk it can be folded for storage although I rarely do that.
customer_reviews.author: MimiinTX

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Husband bought this for me for Xmas. I've been needing an organizer for my SUV forever so I'm happy to finally have one. This is a very nice product, sufficiently large, easy to install, and very functional, and heavy duty. Has compartments with dividers that can be moved to accommodate need. I finally have an organized space instead of a jumbled mess.
customer_reviews.author: GAM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit For The Cargo Area Of My 2015 Pilot!
customer_reviews.text: Fits the storage area in the back of my 2015 Honda Pilot perfectly. High sides keep my stuff from falling out over bumpy terrain and it’s built like a brick outhouse. I took the tie down straps off and replaced them with two $1 camping links and now it is latched securely to the floor anchors on the right side of the cargo area in the back so I still have room back there. Very pleased with this purchase. Completely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: John N Dyan

customer_reviews.title: Good size and durable
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several of these "organizers" and this is the one I picked. Why? The size, how it was made/materials and overall quality. I really like the cooler that came with it. Can use independent of the organizer or place in one of the three compartments. Price was in line with the others I was considering.
customer_reviews.author: Nitro

customer_reviews.title: Great Trunk/Cargo organizer. Well Made. Leaves room for more stuff. Holds plenty. Insulated bag a plus for keeping items cool..
customer_reviews.text: Holds Stuff great. Prevents loose items from banging around. Well made. Plenty of good pockets and places to stow gear. Folds away nicely. Cooler great for six or eight cans, and pops out for easy draining cleaning. Get Two, One for car cleaning supplies, The other for day trips, or for longer travel. Leaves room for a couple of large duffles, backpacks and more. Excellent for sporting equipment.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith - Houston, TX

customer_reviews.title: Great SUV organizer
customer_reviews.text: good size, durable yet collapsible, and an insulated bag that fits into one of the compartments, but the best feature is that it can stand independently, allowing more room in the organizer. I purchased two additional insulated bags. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AnneTh.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted -- a sturdy container for transporting groceries home from the store . As usual, the store uses flimsy bags. The bags would fall over and the contents fall out, often damaging items. This organizer is roomy enough for a major shop and versatile enough to accommodate variously shaped and sized items.
customer_reviews.author: Ron M

customer_reviews.title: Big and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Got it for Christmas per my request and I LOVE IT! I couldn’t wait to go shopping so I could see if it works well. It does, it could be a bit bigger but the size didn’t make me take away stars. I have an Excursion and it fits well, as if where made for a large trunk.
customer_reviews.author: BTD6555

customer_reviews.title: Excellent size and durability
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is just the size I was looking for. Most of the others I found were under 24” long. Wastes a lot of space in the back of my Passport. This one however, takes most of the room, from front to back in the cargo area, and can have individual ends collapsed for versatility if you don’t need it that big on a particular occasion. The fabric is very nice, and very durable. Excellent product for the money. I’d buy it again if I had too, but judging by its construction, I won’t need another one of these for a long time. The “cooler bag” is a nice little add on. Very useful for grocery getting.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J Davies 1972

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the truck
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to organize the back of the truck. She loves having the receiver accessories all in one place, as well as tow strap, jumper cables, and other small emergency items. We have it tied down using the straps provided and it has remained stable where we put it, next to the tailgate. (It is under a bed cover, out of the wind.) I will be ordering one for my SUV next.
customer_reviews.author: BassBastard

customer_reviews.title: Bought a 2nd one!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one last year for my Durango and I love it! My husband loves it so much I got a second one for his CX-5. It fits both cars perfectly. I don't strap it down but my husband preferred to strap his down and the included straps are perfectly adjustable. Each compartment holds A LOT of groceries, so no more rolling around in the back of the car! I've used it for bringing home plants from the nursery so they don't tip over and for many other things. I am very satisfied with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Van Dellen

customer_reviews.title: Trunk organizer of groceries or other things.
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer, so easy to put groceries in it and a freezer bag to boot. It does so well, but only fit 3/4 of my car from side to side, so maybe I should have got a larger size for an SUV (although this is a Toyota van that I use it in, and could be one more section wider). But will transfer it to my Expedition when necessary. Very good quality all around. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy N. Bos-Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and built organizer
customer_reviews.text: This organizer has worked perfectly for me. The product describes itself so I'll skip that and get right to receiving a damaged insulated cooler bag. Some of the threads were received torn/separated. This is definitely as inconvenience but the company's handling of the issue was top notch. A simple message to seller asking if I should return the product or if they would handle it had a new cooler bag on my door step 3 days later.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Works great in the back of a covered pick up truck.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use in the back of pick up truck. My truck has a covered bed so I needed something to carry groceries or whatever and keep them from rolling around inside the bed while driving. This works perfectly. I easily attached it inside the bed with the included straps. I have used the cooler portion several times and it is roomy enough for plenty of frozen or refrigerated foods. The unit is very heavy duty and folds easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size / Quality seemed apparent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my father who is highly organized and owns pretty much everything he could want. He was thrilled with this product as a way to organize miscellaneous items in the back of his small SUV. It was exactly the right size. The quality seemed apparent with the weight of the organizer and he was pretty thrilled with the "bonus" insulated bag for beverages or snacks. It is a little too soon to rate durability but so far so good. I was delighted at how happy he was with the gift.
customer_reviews.author: JK 702

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Its a good product, if I had to give one complaint, it would be that it not wide enough, but I knew the measurements ahead of time, but it doesn't do justice until you have it in hand and in place.... I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great SUV organizer but leaking cooler
customer_reviews.text: Great car organizer but cooler leaks real bad. Need to come up with a better cooler that holds ice more than a couple of hours and does not leak all over my SUV. The whole bag of ice melted and ran out of the cooler even though there was no holes in the cooler. This was the first time I used the cooler. It is a great idea though to have a cooler included but just wish it worked well. The car organizer is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Love the storage capacity it has, the great quality and size. Fits just perfectly in the backseat of my golf cart so I can put my groceries in the compartments. Attaches nicely with the straps. The cooler part fits down into one of the compartments perfectly to keep the cold items cool till we get home.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but it a little flimsy when carrying it. Needs more bottom support.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Crane

customer_reviews.title: Nooooice!👍
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Fits perfectly behind the rear seat in my 2004 Subaru Forester. It does have a strong plastic odor and would recommend airing it out in the sun for a couple days. Other than that it's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: TattedTotoro

customer_reviews.title: Large durable healvyduty organizer for SUVs
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty material. Feels very durable. The design of the compartments is really sensible. Most importantly it’s one of the biggest cargo organizer out there. I stufffed the cooler bag and lined up the whole thing across the back of my MDX and the fit was as close to perfect as can be.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hsu

customer_reviews.title: so far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father in law to put in the back of the jeep! He loves the many pockets/compartments and the ability to expand.
customer_reviews.author: Webb's

customer_reviews.title: Just as promised
customer_reviews.text: The trunk organizer is just as promised. It fits perfectly in my Toyota Rav 4, and keeps everything that I haul in my trunk snug and secure. Also comes with an insulated section which easily separates from the rest of the organizer for easy carrying of cold things to the beach, or in from the grocery store. Pretty sweet way to keep the trunk organized and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Just put it in my Equinox cargo area. Fit perfectly opened to 3 compartments. I was a little unclear how to use the anchor straps but eventually just looped them around the back seat head rests and clipped to the organizer. I see no reason it would not stay in place. The compartments can be set up in so many different configurations I doubt I'll ever need anything else. Seems very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Deasy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality trunk organizer
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with the quality of this organizer. Fits well in the back of my SUV. I'm glad that it came with hooks which helps keep it in place when i have big bulky items. I definitely would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: GaR

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I actually sent it back, but only because it was smaller than I thought it would be. I can’t say negative things about the product just because it wasn’t right for me. It’s very versatile with plenty of storage for a trunk-I wanted it for a pick up truck.
customer_reviews.author: Nick P.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is heavy duty, perfect for groceries or other items that need to be organized. Pay a couple bucks extra and get this one, its worth it!
customer_reviews.author: ths2

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy quality, fast shipping. I love that you can change the size of the compartments and I love the free cooler pack that comes with it. I keep the cooler pack in one of the compartments at all times and place my bags full of cold stuff from the grocery store in it for the ride home.
customer_reviews.author: Alyandoly

customer_reviews.title: Tough storage for a  pick up bed
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how rugged this is. I plan to use it in my pickup bed and really need a tough organizer. I have had several others fail from normal use. This one looks like it will stand up for sure. The straps that come with it allow me to secure it so it does not roll around in my truck bed which is a really good bonus. I haven't tried the cooler yet, but I am often in need of something to transport cold goods and expect it to get a lot of use
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our SUV. Good for groceries, good for cold items in the middle cooler, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ernst

customer_reviews.title: This thing is versitile
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the organizer. It fits perfectly in her car and helps to keeps things from moving around. I like it because it helps her to keep the trunk neat.
customer_reviews.author: Pwr Stroke

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing about this product I didn’t like. It was perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: B. C. MS

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: i liked everything about it,,,i just want to know where do you tie the straps to...please let me know,,,thanks
customer_reviews.author: Joan Dagostino

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Made of very sturdy material, strong stitching, and fits perfect in my 2007 Mini Cooper. My trunk is organized, and I would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL

customer_reviews.title: Fantasti Organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this organized. Works great in the back of my SUV for grocery store trips. Folds up easily if needed. Can't get much better!
customer_reviews.author: DougL

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The quality and solid craftsmanship of this product is superior to the others I've purchased. Plenty of storage and features. Very happy, bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I want it to do. Carry stuff without sliding around. And the cooler comes in real handy also.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Shelko

customer_reviews.title: Great SUV Organiser!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for an SUV or large vehicle. It can be modified in a variety of ways to fit whatever needs you may have and the cooler insert is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! It makes getting groceries a much better task. In the mountains, on curvy roads, it's amazing. Fits well in a small car and in a large SUV. The ease of collapsing it is also super awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Higgs

customer_reviews.title: Missing cooler
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriends birthday. He likes it but it didn’t come with the cooler like it advertised, which was the reason I picked this one over others. He decided to keep it as is and amazon have me a $10 credit!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: great Features
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift, so I can not rate it, but it seemed very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flexibility
customer_reviews.text: A very nice product. Expect it will serve us well. Sturdy and well designed.
customer_reviews.author: jdelashaw

customer_reviews.title: You will be amazed at the good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The heavy material and the generous sized cool bag. This is so well made, my groceries stay where I put them even around sharp turns. No more chasing cans and broken eggs!
customer_reviews.author: OREGON RDH

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It is everything it advertised to be and more. Of course you gave a wonderful description, but to actually have it and see how it works was more than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: R. Carter Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Seems great so far
customer_reviews.text: Just got this so will have to see how it does over time. Plenty of room, love the cooler feature. Stays put in the back of the SUV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Capacity, fit and price
customer_reviews.text: The item was bigger than what was offered by Sabaru, giving more capacity. It fit well within the space and included a separate item for cold products and it fit right next to the storage unit. It was also cheaper in cost, not quality, with significant more storage capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: Its very large and perfect for a small suv
customer_reviews.text: I clean houses for a living so I always have cleaning supplies in the back of my car and this thing has been a life saver! No more empty bottles or rags floating around anymore! Its very large and perfect for a small suv.
customer_reviews.author: K.Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: they are very sturdy and they keep everything organized and keep items from moving around in the back of the vehicle. We like them so well we have purchased 3 of them for different vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: W J D

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Does The Trick
customer_reviews.text: I initially thought it was too big for my 2019 4runner to my relief and surprise it fits perfectly. I love the versatility of organizer it can be collapsed and each compartment has a removable divider and it has pockets and a added bonus a soft ice cooler
customer_reviews.author: rodell59

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This storage is perfect for my Pilot. Some said the cooler is not waterproof but, I found it to hold water. Would buy again if I ever lost it.
customer_reviews.author: FireDoll Assembly

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect. The cooler bag is a nice addition. The material feels very heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jim

customer_reviews.title: It works really well
customer_reviews.text: This really awesome, however no room behind it being used.
customer_reviews.author: ecathrync

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Finally my car is organized. This is very sturdy. I love the compartments. The cooler that came with it was much larger then I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: lissa81

customer_reviews.title: Good size and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I put this in the back of my Jeep wrangler for groceries, etal. I like the side pockets for storing maps, etc. It is the perfect size for what I wanted and the cooler was a nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Very, very durable!
customer_reviews.text: Even though this isn't the original Tuff Viking car storage I ordered, the person I bought it for enjoys it anyway so, I didn't send it back! It's very sturdy and durable. Heavy duty stuff! Just wish I had the cooler that was in the original one I ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Cowles

customer_reviews.title: You Need Tuff Viking SUV Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Love the Tuff Viking SUV Organizer For Its Durable Toughness & Well Thought Out Flexible Design Highly Recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Redmon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Mazda CX-5
customer_reviews.text: The size of the fully expanded Organizer comfortably fits in the cargo area and the tie straps work very well with a Mazda CX-5. The fitted cooler option is very helpful when bringing home frozen/refrigerated groceries.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: A needed item
customer_reviews.text: If you have a truck you really want one of these. Great for shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T. Herron

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my car quality is great fit perfect very nice
customer_reviews.author: alex melnikoff

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces!! ***** Update ******
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with the straps missing. Real nice bag but will return because of missing straps. ***** Update***** Company contacted me and sent straps and sun visor for my troubles. Fantastic customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: scupper2112

customer_reviews.title: His seems to offer a lot of storage
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this unit . It’s much larger than other ones I looked at. This will definitely holds quite few shopping bags and it’s great not having everything just rolling around the back of my Grand Cherokee. If the quality is as good as the way they look these should be great
customer_reviews.author: Railman

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. The quality is excellent, very durable. The adjustable compartments and the extra pockets are very handy. The free cold bag was a bonus and is very useful for road trips.
customer_reviews.author: rfrtx

customer_reviews.title: Awesome except for the smell.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product (size, sturdiness, versatility) except for the smoke smell. I have had it for a little over two weeks and I have tried to air it out along large quantities of Febreeze, and it isn’t much better yet. Besides that, it is perfect for my Jeep.
customer_reviews.author: Michele R Kuehner

customer_reviews.title: Variety is the spice of life!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of options for straps and comfortable carrying handles when I need to take it out the trunk
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I have only has it a short time, but it seems to be made well. Just needs a few days of air to get rid of the chemical smell of the material used. other wise OK.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item shipped!
customer_reviews.text: The physical product seems very sturdy and I believe will work for what I need. I am giving 3 stars because I ordered black and received red. I am returning this item and have already placed my order for black (again). Hopefully I will receive the correct color. Very inconvenient!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Like it al ot
customer_reviews.text: Works great keeps all my stuff from rolling away in back of my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Ed 123

customer_reviews.title: I also like the insulated bag that came with it
customer_reviews.text: Have not used the product yet, but it appears to very durable. The main pockets are very spacious, a hug plus for groceries. I also like the insulated bag that came with it. The 4 stars instead of 5 is because their was no paperwork in the package about its characteristics, construction or purpose of the extra pocket dividers. The current web site shows a different product when I select this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis J. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Durable product
customer_reviews.text: Best aid for shopping ever. Holds items from an entire shopping trip with ease and the cooler is great for cold items. No more groceries rolling around everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Brulett

customer_reviews.title: best trunk organizer on amazon
customer_reviews.text: Researched on Amazon for a handful of trunk organizer options and finally picked this one. I have made the right choice. Great design and solid construction. 2018 4runner trd
customer_reviews.author: Minh N.

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I use to put groceries in when ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I use to put groceries in when we get home she gets one I get other and take all groceries inside at once. Very well built
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the amount of storage
customer_reviews.text: Love the amount of storage, have hiking shoes, blow up beach chairs, hats, medical kit, sun hat and more and now it is all store neatly on my SUV trunk and the straps hold it is place as well as the plastic truck liner that did not stay in place until now.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality product that looks as though it will last a longtime.
customer_reviews.author: threeohthree

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Use it to organize ny car trunk. Very sturdy and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Blackson

customer_reviews.title: Your can use 2 out of 3 compartments for narrower vehicles.
customer_reviews.text: The 3 compartments fit nicely across in my Toyota 4runner. Durable and well manufactured. Ample pockets and customizable dividers. Bonus cooler was a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: C. DeJesus

customer_reviews.title: Gift for dad
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my dad and he loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Pelkey

customer_reviews.title: Flexibility
customer_reviews.text: I can form this to what ever I need in terms of space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great product with a relatively low cost! This item is well made and large enough to hold a lot of items.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Solid storage unit. Have it in back of pickup. Included cooler is a bonus. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Sean Garecht

customer_reviews.title: Broken clip
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this yet, but it seems very durable and exactly what I was looking for. It did come with one of the clips broken right out of the package. That’s why the 3 stars. I would exchange it except I need it for this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "You get what you pay for" and I'm very happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. It's made with quality materials and sturdy, unlike the inexpensive ones I bought before. I have a new SUV and this keeps my shopping well organized. Plus the included cooler does not leak out the smell of my take out food.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M

customer_reviews.title: Worth it 100%
customer_reviews.text: This is great for grocery day, packing for a road trip or just keeping our winter essentials stored for roadside break downs.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal 101

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and good value.
customer_reviews.text: I like the heavy, sturdy construction and you can configure 2 of the compartments In Half should you need to. And straps were Included at attached to the hooks in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L.

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for your car if you’re on the go
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it will definitely recommend this to everybody I know
customer_reviews.author: SUSIE Q

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for grocery shopping, and having anything stored in back you don't want to hear roll around!
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Great storage organizer for a covered pickup bed.
customer_reviews.text: This organizer has a lot of storage space, the cooler fits in it perfectly, and there are lots of options for tie downs in the back of a pickup.
customer_reviews.author: JeepAngler

customer_reviews.title: Great useful product 👌
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for groceries, we just eached grabbed a handle and carried the whole thing in the house, one trip done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Tossed away my old organizer. Insulated cooler bag is perfect for steaks or seafood. Folds out of way easily for mountain bikes👍👍
customer_reviews.author: soggy dog

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy and fits my Tacoma well, glad to have it
customer_reviews.author: Emre R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Perfect for my travel training items! Very durable! Very well made! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciated the versatility to changes overall size and the ability to compartmentalize. Should have gotten this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel T. Pelchar

customer_reviews.title: Comes with separate insulated bag that can also fit in one of the partitions.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality materials except for the zipper of the insulated bag that came separated. I fixed it and hope it does not separate again.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This is a great organizer. So happy with our purchase. We contacted customer service and they were fast to respond and address my issue. Very Satisfied Customer.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hurd

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one last year and liked it so much I got another for my parents. It’s a lifesaver, especially on grocery day!
customer_reviews.author: K. Ware

customer_reviews.title: I love this product it’s very strong and is perfect for what I need.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for for back
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is Good quality and perfect size for our Jeep Wrangler! This is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: cindy reynolds

customer_reviews.title: keeps this nice and organized
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift to my girlfriend to help her organize the back of her police unit. She loves it, keeps this nice and organized. Good strong straps keeps it in place. Also likes the removable soft-side cooler. Now her station chief wants one. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Crane

product_meta.title: Tuff Viking Convertible Large 3 Compartment SUV Trunk Organizer | Grocery Organizer w Tie Down Straps and Insulated Leakproof Cooler Bag for Cars, Trucks and SUVs. PATENTED (3-in-1 w/Cooler, Black)
feature_bullets: ✅ 😍 😍SUPER SALE! BUY 2 GET 10% OFF Enter code" TUFFVIKING " :/ BUY 3 OR MORE GET 15% OFF! Enter code" GOVIKING"😍 😍✅INNOVATIVE DESIGN 3 ADJUSTABLE SIZES - When only the Best will do this Large 3 Compartment SUV trunk organizer can be configured to 6 compartments when using 3 removable dividers. When Bigger Is Better…Size Matters! However, Quality, Value and Great Customer Service matters too! PATENTED.

✅ LARGE SIZE RUGGED HEAVY DUTY CONSTRUCTION – This professional grade car trunk organizer is built to last with heavy duty 1680D Oxford polyester double thread stitching. Premium quality, long lasting, strong, durable & stylish, water resistant and abrasion resistant. With a solid 3-layer water resistant bottom board for the base, this 3-in-1 trunk organizer for cars will last a long time with repeated use. Heavy duty strong soft handle provides for easy carrying & storage security.

✅ FULLY LINED INTERIOR & SPACE-SAVING DESIGN- Inside this cargo trunk organizer is lined with water resistant umbrella material to guard against spills and splashes. Use your grocery organizer without worry. Water resistant material can be cleaned with disinfectant wipe or spray using a dry cloth. When you’re not using our storage caddy, it collapses flat to 4.75” easy to fold and can fit in a drawer.

✅ KEEPS ORGANIZER IN PLACE WITH ADJUSTABLE TIE DOWN STRAPS - The Tuff Viking organizer provides 2 extra V-Straps to ensure the organizer does not move around in your vehicle in severe conditions. Hook and loop or magic fastener applications on the base of the cargo organizer may damage your vehicle's carpet after repeated use and will not work inside a truck bed.

✅ KEEPS YOUR VEHICLE CLEAN & MESS FREE WITH A 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE- Full 100% satisfaction guarantee included with our quality product. If there are any issues, simply reach out to us. This is a risk-free worthwhile investment!
